gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Rockets 116, Clippers 105
gameRecap.excerpt: The Rockets defeated the Clippers, 116-105. Amen Thompson recorded the first triple-double of his career with 18 points, 11 rebounds, and a career-high 10 assists. Terance Mann led the Clippers with 24 points. The Rockets end the season at 41-41 as the Clippers end the year at 51-31.
